snippet.title: How to Control Euro Truck Simulator 2 using Android device | Fully Functional All in One Controller!
snippet.description:
Hey whats up yo guys, welcome back to another tutorial on how to control your PC games using your android device. The Monect Gaming Controller does this magic and preciously you can keep the control over the game and the Controller itself. The Steering accuracy is pretty much good and it use sensors of your android device. 

🔹️GTA Vice City Definitive Edition Layout: https://bit.ly/35xrNnh

▪️TimeStamps:
00:08 Gameplay short preview 
00:25 Introduction
01:11 Controler settings 
02:00 Keystrokes settings 
04:14 Gameplay settings 
04:40 Interior layout review
06:42 Camera layout review
07:02 Hud layout review
07:22 Gameplay

Officially, there was no any gaming layout made for Euro Truck Simulator 2. So i thought it'd be great if i could design a fully functional layout myself for the addictive simulation game. So here we're! 

Attached files:
▪️Monect Receiver for Windows- https://bit.ly/38PNkH8
▪️Monect Controller for Android- https://bit.ly/3721EKB
▪️Gaming Layout(Direct link in video description)- https://bit.ly/37Lpo9p

Note: 
▪️The Steering function for this game ( in this case, ETS 2 ) would only work with Gyroscope sensor. You can check whether your device got the sensor by googling the model and under specifications there will be info related sensors.
▪️Layouts are only compatible with v7.3.3 or higher versions, otherwise will encounter "problem parsing" error.
▪️Seek into 2:20 in the video where mentioned below and see how the layout been installed manually to avoid "parse failed" error.
▪️You can always use my gaming layout and make any sort of gameplay videos, but be generous a little to Mention me in your video description. 

If This is the first time you use this application, please go through the video mentioned down below which I'm showing how to setup your Android device with the PC in order to work this Controller. 

▪️How to setup Monect Gaming Controller on Android with Windows: https://youtu.be/JyiLT49WIcU

►Leaving a LIKE would always appreciate! 
►Subscribe for latest video uploads! http://bit.ly/29ZRld9

Our social media:
◽Like on Facebook: http://bit.ly/2acp9pO
◽Follow on Twitter: http://bit.ly/6zco6Xb
◽Message on Hangouts: Redux Dreams Lab

#ETS2Controller
#AndroidController
#GamingControllerForPC
#WirelessAndroidControllerPC

Thanks for watching and see you back!
